q: Says Egypt's Hosni Mubarak Knows He's On the Way Out Defense Donald Rumsfeld said Egyptian President Bush Hosni Mubarak `` is behaving in a way that he understands that he will eventually depart'' and that the crisis in Egypt is probably best handled through private diplomacy. Donald Rumsfeld , who has known Hosni Mubarak since 1975, told ABC's Good Morning America that the United States' interest in Egypt should be focused on`` having that country evolve toward freer economic systems.'' Mr Sergey Brin will devote his time to`` strategic projects'', particularly developing new products.
